Class LogAnalyzer

extends java.lang.Object
    Read web server data and analyse hourly access patterns.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void analyzeDaylyData()
      Analyze the dayly access data from the log file.

      Analyze the hourly access data from the log file.

      Analyze the monthly access data from the log file.
      int busiestDay()
      Returns the busiest day in the data se
      int busiestHour()
      Returns the busiest Hour in a year (weblog adjusted to a year of hours)
      int busiestMonth()
      Returns the busiest month in the data se
      int busiestTwoHour()
      finds which two-hour period is the busiest returns the value of the first hour of this period

      Takes the name of the log file to be analyzed
      void printData()
      Print the lines of data read by the LogfileReader
      void printDaylyCounts()
      Print the dayly counts.
      void printHourlyCounts()
      Print the hourly counts.
      void printMonthlyCountsByYear()
      Print the monthly counts.
      int quietestDay()
      Returns the quietest Day in a year
      int quietestHour()
      Returns the quietest Hour in a year (weblog adjusted to a year of hours)
      int quietestMonth()
      Returns the quietest Month in a year
      int totalAccessesPerHour()
      Return the number of accesses recorded in the log file.
